personalInfo.name: Oktavia Dwi Putri Permatasari
personalInfo.summary: Quality Assurance Engineer with 2+ years of experience in manual and automation testing. Strong expertise in API testing using Postman & Newman, web automation using Katalon Studio, and comprehensive QA documentation. Experienced in banking, fintech, government, and enterprise projects.

items.title: Quality Assurance Analyst
items.subtitle: PT Metrocom Jaddi Technology (Placement: Bank BTN)
items.description: QA Analyst responsible for API quality and documentation in banking systems.
bullets: Developed and executed automated API test scenarios using Postman and Newman based on ASPI standards
Reviewed BRD, flowchart, and UI design to understand system requirements
Validated API request-response data flow and integration
Managed bug lifecycle and coordinated fixes with developers
Maintained API specifications and converted SOAP UI collections to Postman

items.title: Quality Assurance (Freelance)
items.subtitle: PT Finnet Indonesia
items.description: Freelance QA supporting web and API testing for fintech applications.
bullets: Designed and executed functional test scenarios
Performed web UI automation testing using Katalon Studio
Built API automation tests using Postman and Newman
Generated HTML test reports for stakeholders
Managed QA projects using Git for collaboration

items.title: Software Tester

bullets: Created test cases for 7+ internal applications
